preset.title: Preset
preset.tooltip: Chooses the settings for you. You can still change the settings after selecting a preset. Close and open the settings menu again to see the changes (the mod manager is buggy).

disableGravityCrystal.title: Disable Ship Gravity
disableGravityCrystal.tooltip: Disables the gravity crystal inside the ship.

disableHeadlights.title: Disable Headlights
disableHeadlights.tooltip: Disables the ship headlights and the landing camera light.

disableLandingCamera.title: Disable Landing Camera
disableLandingCamera.tooltip: Disables the landing camera. Good luck making a proper landing!

disableEjectButton.title: Disable Eject Button
disableEjectButton.tooltip: Disables the eject button in the cockpit.

disableShipLights.title: Disable Ship Lights
disableShipLights.tooltip: Permanently turns off both the interior and exterior lighting fixtures.

disableAutoLights.title: Disable Automatic Lights
disableAutoLights.tooltip: Keeps all of the lights on when you leave the ship instead of turning them off.

disableShipOxygen.title: Disable Ship Oxygen
disableShipOxygen.tooltip: Removes all of the oxygen from your ship. Don't stay out in space for too long!

disableScoutRecall.title: Disable Ship Scout Recall
disableScoutRecall.tooltip: Removes your ability to recall the scout with the ship.

disableScoutLaunching.title: Disable Ship Scout Launching
disableScoutLaunching.tooltip: Removes your ability to launch the scout with the ship.

disableShipRepair.title: Disable Ship Repairing
disableShipRepair.tooltip: Removes your ability to repair your ship. Be careful out there!

disableDamageIndicators.title: Disable Damage Indicators
disableDamageIndicators.tooltip: Removes all indicators that tell you the ship is damaged. Also disables the master alarm. Keep an eye or four on the reactor!

disableSeatbelt.title: Disable Seatbelt
disableSeatbelt.tooltip: Removes the seatbelt in your ship that keeps you from killing yourself. If you crash into something too quickly you'll fly out of your chair.

disableShipSuit.title: Disable Ship Suit
disableShipSuit.tooltip: Removes the suit from the ship. How long can you hold your breath in space?

disableAirAutoRoll.title: Disable Air Auto Roll
disableAirAutoRoll.tooltip: Allows your ship to rotate freely in atmospheres.

disableWaterAutoRoll.title: Disable Water Auto Roll
disableWaterAutoRoll.tooltip: Allows your ship to rotate freely in water.

disableRotationSpeedLimit.title: Disable Rotation Speed Limit
disableRotationSpeedLimit.tooltip: Lets you spin your ship as quickly as you want. DO NOT ENABLE IF YOU ARE PRONE TO MOTION SICKNESS.

disableShipFriction.title: Disable Ship Friction
disableShipFriction.tooltip: Turns off the ship's friction so that it slides everywhere. Good luck landing on anything.

disableReferenceFrame.title: Disable Lock-on
disableReferenceFrame.tooltip: Disables your ability to lock on to objects. You may find it difficult to use autopilot with this enabled.

disableMapMarkers.title: Disable Map Markers
disableMapMarkers.tooltip: Removes the markers that tell you the location of your ship, your scout, and any marked locations in the ship log. Try not to get lost.

oxygenDrainMultiplier.title: Oxygen Drain Multiplier
oxygenDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the speed at which the ship oxygen drains. The default speed takes about 12.8 hours to fully drain.

fuelDrainMultiplier.title: Fuel Drain Multiplier
fuelDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the speed at which the ship fuel drains. The default speed takes about 34 minutes to fully drain.

oxygenTankDrainMultiplier.title: Oxygen Tank Drain Multiplier
oxygenTankDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the amount of oxygen that drains when the oxygen tank is damaged in addition to the regular drain rate. The default speed is 38 times faster.

fuelTankDrainMultiplier.title: Fuel Tank Drain Multiplier
fuelTankDrainMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the amount of fuel that drains when the fuel tank is damaged in addition to the regular drain rate. The default speed is about 10 times faster.

oxygenRefillMultiplier.title: Oxygen Refill Multiplier
oxygenRefillMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the speed at which the ship oxygen refills. The default speed takes about a minute to completely refill.

fuelTransferMultiplier.title: Fuel Transfer Multiplier
fuelTransferMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the amount of fuel added to the ship when transferring fuel, and also increase the amount of fuel subtracted when refueling the jetpack.

idleFuelConsumptionMultiplier.title: Idle Fuel Consumption Multiplier
idleFuelConsumptionMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the rate at which your ship's fuel drains while it is on. The default speed is about 100 times slower than the active consumption rate.

shipDamageMultiplier.title: Damage Multiplier
shipDamageMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the damage done to the ship hull and increase the probability that components will be damaged on impact.

shipDamageSpeedMultiplier.title: Damage Speed Multiplier
shipDamageSpeedMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the minimum speed for taking impact damage. Set this to something super small to blow up your ship when you touch something.

temperatureDamageMultiplier.title: Temperature Damage Multiplier
temperatureDamageMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the damage that the ship takes from extreme temperatures.

temperatureResistanceMultiplier.title: Temperature Resistance Multiplier
temperatureResistanceMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the time the ship can resist extreme temperatures. The default resistance gives the ship around 3 minutes before the hull reaches max temperature, meaning max damage.

gravityMultiplier.title: Ship Gravity Multiplier
gravityMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the power of the ship's gravity crystal.

atmosphereAngularDragMultiplier.title: Atmosphere Angular Drag Multiplier
atmosphereAngularDragMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers make your ship harder to turn while in an atmosphere. Set to zero to make your ship spin forever. WARNING: Values below 1 may cause motion sickness.

spaceAngularDragMultiplier.title: Space Angular Drag Multiplier
spaceAngularDragMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers make your ship harder to turn while in space. Set to zero to make your ship spin forever. WARNING: Values below 1 may cause motion sickness.

shipExplosionMultiplier.title: Ship Explosion Multiplier
shipExplosionMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the size of the explosion that is created when your ship blows up.

reactorLifetimeMultiplier.title: Reactor Lifetime Multiplier
reactorLifetimeMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase the time it takes for the reactor to blow up the ship. The default time is between 25 and 35 seconds.

shipBounciness.title: Ship Bounciness
shipBounciness.tooltip: Adjusts how bouncy the ship is. A value of 2 should double the ship's speed when it collides with something.

shipInputLatency.title: Ship Input Latency
shipInputLatency.tooltip: Adds a delay while piloting the ship between when you press the button and when the ship recieves the input. Now you can pretend you're playing online!

shipOxygenRefill.title: Enable Ship Oxygen Refill
shipOxygenRefill.tooltip: Refills the ship's oxygen tank when near oxygen sources. Doesn't work when oxygen is disabled.

enableShipFuelTransfer.title: Enable Ship Fuel Transfer
enableShipFuelTransfer.tooltip: Lets you transfer your jetpack fuel to the ship through the fuel tank to refill it.

enableJetpackRefuelDrain.title: Enable Jetpack Refuel Drain
enableJetpackRefuelDrain.tooltip: Drains the ship's fuel when you refill your jetpack in the ship.

enableAutoHatch.title: Enable Automatic Hatch
enableAutoHatch.tooltip: Automatically closes the hatch when you leave the ship.

extraNoise.title: Enable Extra Noise
extraNoise.tooltip: Makes things such as the master alarm detectable by noise-sensing things.

enableShipItemPlacement.title: Enable Ship Item Placement
enableShipItemPlacement.tooltip: Lets you drop items inside of the ship or on top of the ship.

enableManualScoutRecall.title: Enable Manual Scout Recall
enableManualScoutRecall.tooltip: Forces you to retrieve your scout by hand when you launch it. If you retrieve it with the ship, you need to go get it from on top of the ship before you can fire it on foot.

temperatureZonesAmount.title: Add Temperature Zones
temperatureZonesAmount.tooltip: Determines whether to add temperature zones around the entire solar system, just around the sun, or to add none at all.

hullTemperatureDamage.title: Enable Hull Temperature Damage
hullTemperatureDamage.tooltip: Damages the ship hull over time in extremely high or low temperatures.

componentTemperatureDamage.title: Enable Component Temperature Damage
componentTemperatureDamage.tooltip: Damages the ship components over time in extremely high or low temperatures.

hotThrusters.title: Enable Hazardous Thrusters
hotThrusters.tooltip: Makes the ship thruster flames do damage when you stand in them.

rustLevel.title: Cockpit Rust Level
rustLevel.tooltip: Controls how much rust is applied to the ship cockpit. Setting this to max will completely cover the cockpit in rust.

dirtAccumulationTime.title: Dirt Accumulation Time
dirtAccumulationTime.tooltip: Specifies the time in seconds that it takes for dirt to build up on your cockpit (0 is disabled). Find some water if you want to wash it off.

enableScoutLauncherComponent.title: Add Scout Launcher Component
enableScoutLauncherComponent.tooltip: Turns the ship's scout launcher into a fully functioning component.

enableSignalscopeComponent.title: Add Signalscope Component
enableSignalscopeComponent.tooltip: Turns the ship's signalscope into a fully functioning component. You won't be able to track signals in the ship or hear the ship's signal if the signalscope is damaged.

addShipSignal.title: Add Ship Signal
addShipSignal.tooltip: Allows you to track your ship with the signalscope on the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency. Useful when map markers are disabled.

addPortableCampfire.title: Add Portable Campfire
addPortableCampfire.tooltip: Adds a portable campfire to the ship near your suit. Unpack it anywhere you'd like and roast a marshmallow!

addPortableTractorBeam.title: Add Portable Tractor Beam
addPortableTractorBeam.tooltip: Adds a portable Nomai tractor beam to the ship next to the reactor. Place it on the ground if you need an extra boost in height.

addExpeditionFlag.title: Add Expedition Flag
addExpeditionFlag.tooltip: Adds a portable flag to the ship between the cockpit and the supplies section. Place it on the ground if you want to mark where no Hearthian has gone before.

addTether.title: Add Ship Tether
addTether.tooltip: Adds a few hooks inside the ship that you can place anywhere you want. Interact with it to tether yourself to it, and interact with another to create a line between them.

enableGravityLandingGear.title: Add Gravity Landing Gear
enableGravityLandingGear.tooltip: Adds a switch to the cockpit to enable gravity-powered landing gear.

enableThrustModulator.title: Add Thrust Modulator
enableThrustModulator.tooltip: Adds an interface to the cockpit for decreasing your ship's maximum thrust or putting your reactor in overdrive.

enablePersistentInput.title: Add Persistent Input
enablePersistentInput.tooltip: Adds a switch to the cockpit to enable persistent input, which holds your last input after you unbuckle.

addEngineSwitch.title: Add Engine Switch
addEngineSwitch.tooltip: Adds a switch to the cockpit that turns on the ship. If you turned on idle fuel consumption it will only drain fuel while the ship is on.

shipLightColor.title: Ship Light Color
shipLightColor.tooltip: Changes the color of the interior and exterior ship lights.

interiorHullColor.title: Interior Hull Color
interiorHullColor.tooltip: Changes the color of the inside of the ship.

exteriorHullColor.title: Exterior Hull Color
exteriorHullColor.tooltip: Changes the color of the outside of the ship.

thrusterColor.title: Ship Thruster Flame Color
thrusterColor.tooltip: Changes the color of the thruster flames produced by the ship.

keepHelmetOn.title: Keep Helmet On
keepHelmetOn.tooltip: Prevents the game from automatically removing your helmet if there isn't oxygen present.

showWarningNotifications.title: Show Warning Notifications
showWarningNotifications.tooltip: Notifies you in the ship when resources are low or when the outside conditions are becoming dangerous.
